burn((uint32,uint64,uint128,bytes32,uint.details: Converts token amounts to vault chain decimals before sending

params.burnData: Contains burn request details including amount and chain info

returns._0: A string indicating this is the ledger cross-chain manager

initialize().details: Sets up the upgradeable contract with ownership and UUPS functionality

mint((uint64,uint128,bytes32,uint256,uin.details: Converts token amounts to vault chain decimals before sending

params.mintData: Contains mint request details including amount and chain info

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

receiveMessage((uint8,uint8,uint8,addres.details: Routes messages based on their type and performs necessary decimal conversions

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

sendTestWithdraw(uint256).details: Uses a special token symbol "CrossChainManagerTest" for testing

params.dstChainId: The destination chain to test connectivity with

setCCRelayOption(uint256,uint8).details: Allows the owner to set the cross-chain relay option0: LayerZeroV1, 1: LayerZeroV2

params._chainId: The chain ID of vault chain

setChainId(uint256).details: Critical for cross-chain message routing and token decimal conversions

params._chainId: The chain ID where this contract is deployed

setCrossChainRelay(address).details: The relay handles the actual cross-chain message transmission via LayerZero

params._crossChainRelay: Address of the cross-chain relay contract

setCrossChainRelayV2(address).details: The relay handles the actual cross-chain message transmission via LayerZero

params._crossChainRelayV2: Address of the cross-chain relay contract v2

setLedger(address).details: The Ledger contract will be the only one allowed to initiate withdrawals

params._ledger: Address of the Orderly Ledger contract

setOperatorManager(address).details: The operator manager handles permissions and operational controls

params._operatorManager: Address of the operator manager contract

setRelayStatus(address,bool).details: Allows the owner to enable or disable a relay

params._ccRelay: The address of the cross-chain relay
params._status: The new status of the relay (true for enabled, false for disabled)

setTokenDecimal(bytes32,uint256,uint128).details: Critical for accurate token amount conversions between chains

params.decimal: The number of decimal places for the token
params.tokenChainId: The chain ID where the token exists
params.tokenHash: The hash of the token symbol

setVaultCrossChainManager(uint256,addres.details: Required for routing messages to the correct vault on each chain

params._chainId: The chain ID where the vault exists
params._vaultCrossChainManager: Address of the vault's cross-chain manager

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeTo(address).details: Only callable by owner through proxy

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

burn((uint32,uint64,uint128,bytes32,uint.notice: Initiates a token burn operation on a vault chain

ccRelayOption(uint256).notice: Flag to indicate the version of the cross-chain relay for each chain

chainId().notice: Chain ID where this contract is deployed

convertDecimal(uint128,bytes32,uint256,u.notice: convert token amount to dst chain decimal

crossChainRelay().notice: Interface to the cross-chain messaging relay

crossChainRelayV2().notice: Interface to the cross-chain messaging relay v2

enabledRelays(address).notice: Mapping of enabled cross-chain relay addresses

getRole().notice: Returns the role identifier for this contract

ledger().notice: Interface to the main ledger contract

mint((uint64,uint128,bytes32,uint256,uin.notice: Initiates a token mint operation on a vault chain

receiveMessage((uint8,uint8,uint8,addres.notice: Handles incoming cross-chain messages from the relay

sendTestWithdraw(uint256).notice: Sends a test withdrawal message to verify cross-chain connectivity

setChainId(uint256).notice: Sets the chain ID for this contract instance

setCrossChainRelay(address).notice: Sets the cross-chain relay contract address

setCrossChainRelayV2(address).notice: Sets the cross-chain relay contract address

setLedger(address).notice: Links this contract to the Orderly Ledger

setOperatorManager(address).notice: Sets the operator manager contract address

setRelayStatus(address,bool).notice: Sets the status of a cross-chain relay

setTokenDecimal(bytes32,uint256,uint128).notice: Sets the decimal places for a token on a specific chain

setVaultCrossChainManager(uint256,addres.notice: Maps a chain ID to its vault cross-chain manager address

tokenDecimalMapping(bytes32,uint256).notice: Maps token hash and chain ID to token decimals for amount conversion

vaultCrossChainManagers(uint256).notice: Maps chain IDs to their respective vault cross-chain manager addresses

withdraw((uint128,uint128,uint256,bytes3.notice: send a cross-chain withdrawal from the ledger to the vault.

withdraw2Contract((uint128,uint128,uint2.notice: send a cross-chain withdrawal from the ledger to the vault. but only withdraw to contract address
